attributes.action: Save the Ferry link to Europe from Rosyth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the government to do all in it's power to save the link from Scotland to Europe.  The implications of the withdrawal are enormous not only to the haulage business etc but more especially to the tourist industry which is already suffering because of the fuel charges etc.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
